page.title: 09Family Life -1985.
page.content: "My mum is an auxillary nurse at a cottage hospital. My dad works at a school for handicapped, or disturbed children. My mum sometimes sleeps during the day after having a night at work. She also teaches cake decorating at college. My sister and I sometimes go to the Green to play in an old tree, we have great fun. In Summer, I go on bike rides with my dad and sister.I play several musical instruments and I go to Ballet and Brownies. I have a pet cat called Tipsy." "My mum is a housewife, my dad is a farmer. He has 14000 chickens, 50 cows and 36 calves. I have two brothers and one sister. My best sports are Tennis and Football. I go to cubs once a week and I am a "sixer." Two weeks ago we went to camp and the best thing about it was cooking our own meals."
